Class Bitwise

java.lang.Object
  Bitwise

public class Bitwise
extends java.lang.Object

Manage bitwise operations in a byte or array of bytes. Unit tests are in TestBitwise. See TestBitwise.java.

Constructor Summary
Bitwise()
           
 
Method Summary
static byte clear(int i, byte b)
          Clear bit i in byte and return the new byte.
static boolean clear(int i, byte[] bytes)
          Clear bit i in array of bytes and return true if the bit was 1 before clearing, false otherwise.
static void clearAll(byte[] bytes)
          Clear every bit in array of bytes.
static boolean isset(int i, byte b)
          Check to see if bit i is set in byte.
static boolean isset(int i, byte[] bytes)
          Check to see if bit i is set in array of bytes.
static byte set(int i, byte b)
          Set bit i in byte and return the new byte.
static void set(int i, byte[] bytes)
          Set bit i in array of bytes.
static java.lang.String toString(byte b)
          Convert byte to a string of bits.
static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes)
          Convert array of bytes to string of bits, each byte separated by a comma, and every 8 bytes separated by a newline.
static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes, java.lang.String sep)
          Convert array of bytes to string of bits, each byte separated by sep.
static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes, java.lang.String sep, java.lang.String lsep, int every)
          Convert array of bytes to string of bits (each byte converted to a string by calling #byteToString(byte b), every byte separated by sep, every "every" bytes separated by lsep.

Method Detail

isset

public static boolean isset(int i,
                            byte b)
Check to see if bit i is set in byte. Returns true if it is set, false otherwise.

isset

public static boolean isset(int i,
                            byte[] bytes)
Check to see if bit i is set in array of bytes. Returns true if it is set, false otherwise.

set

public static byte set(int i,
                       byte b)
Set bit i in byte and return the new byte.

set

public static void set(int i,
                       byte[] bytes)
Set bit i in array of bytes.

clear

public static byte clear(int i,
                         byte b)
Clear bit i in byte and return the new byte.

clear

public static boolean clear(int i,
                            byte[] bytes)
Clear bit i in array of bytes and return true if the bit was 1 before clearing, false otherwise.

clearAll

public static void clearAll(byte[] bytes)
Clear every bit in array of bytes. There is no clearAll for a single byte, you can just get a new byte for that.

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(byte b)
Convert byte to a string of bits. Each bit is represented as "0" if it is clear, "1" if it is set.

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes,
                                        java.lang.String sep,
                                        java.lang.String lsep,
                                        int every)
Convert array of bytes to string of bits (each byte converted to a string by calling #byteToString(byte b), every byte separated by sep, every "every" bytes separated by lsep.

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes,
                                        java.lang.String sep)
Convert array of bytes to string of bits, each byte separated by sep. See #byteToString(byte bytes[], String sep).

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes)
Convert array of bytes to string of bits, each byte separated by a comma, and every 8 bytes separated by a newline. See #byteToString(byte bytes[], String sep).
